sentences.english: Song Defang Haotian reconstruction concept, and caves dug three holes.
sentences.chinese: 宋德芳重建昊天觀，並開鑿三洞石窟。

definition: Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
Dijun, Shang dynasty protector God, possibly same as legendary Emperor 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4]
Pangu (creator of the universe in Chinese mythology)
Xingtian, headless giant hero of Chinese mythology decapitated by the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
to greet and usher in (guests, newcomers etc)/(Buddhism) to receive into the Pure Land
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
the intersection of the Moon's orbit with the ecliptic in Vedic astronomy (Sanskrit rahu)
